data.eml:eml: A new species of Pseudopaludicola (Anura, Leiuperidae) from western Piauí State, Northeast Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Roberto, Igor Joventino, Cardozo, Dario, Ávila, Robson W. (2013): A new species of Pseudopaludicola (Anura, Leiuperidae) from western Piauí State, Northeast Brazil. Zootaxa 3636 (2): 348-360, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3636.2.6
